item.description: The NYT article characterizes the likely criminal activity as a mere attempt to 'push the envelope.'

item.title: IG Michael Horowitz Has Some Explaining To Do About FBI’s Ability To Hide Documents

item.title: State GOP Network Launches GOTV Campaign To Turn Virginia, New Jersey ‘Red’ This November
item.description: 'If anyone is out here saying on our side that it is going to be easy, that's just incorrect,' RSLC's Mason Di Palma told The Federalist.
